name: Feedly by Lerkero: Beige and Brown
description: Feedly presented with beige, brown, red, and black colors. Notes included in the CSS so that you can easily edit color changes.
additional_info:
Notes are included with the CSS code to indicate what each line does. If there are any concerns or suggestions please let me know.

I am not an expert at CSS but I will do my best to make use of this CSS edit. Feedly has a decent set of color options (which is better than most websites), but I wanted to make a custom colorization that pleased my eyes the most.
